review_title: Really enjoyed the "family" feel of my department
pros: Wonderful sense of togetherness (once you get to know the lab ladies! [and gentlemen]). The small working environment makes communication essential.  Able to learn a LOT of hands-on knowledge that big cities lack.
cons: Pay not compensative to degree and experience.  Extremely low turnover rate, therefore extremely low (literally almost zero chance) opportunity for promotions.  Lack of benefits and short staffed.

cons: Buildings are old but quite honestly a lot of emphasis is on building a better atmosphere.
